description: The dashboard provides insights of Azure Key Vaults overview, failures and operations.

options.content:
Key Vault Name: ${resource} Vault URI: ${endpoint}
Resource Group: ${rg} SKU: ${sku}
Location: ${location}

azureResourceGraph.query:
Resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.keyvault/vaults'
| where name == '${resource}'
| project location

Resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.keyvault/vaults'
| where name == '${resource}'
| project tostring(properties.vaultUri)

Resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.keyvault/vaults'
| where name == '${resource}'
| project tostring(properties.sku.name)

title: Azure Key Vaults
